audios.au: To raise the lifting axle using the remote-control unit, the lifting axle is preselected using the according preselect button.
At a push of the RAISE button the raising operation is triggered and the lifting bellow is pressurized.

Simultanuously the supporting bellows of the lifting axle are vented. Due to the new load distribution and the additional weight of the lifting axle the pressure in the supporting bellows of both rear axles is increased.
At a push of the LOWER button the lifting axle is lowered.

To do so, the lifting bellow is vented and the supporting bellows of the lifting axle are pressurized. When the lifting axle is lowered, due to the easing the bellows pressure at the rear axles is decreased.
